import { LeftIcon } from 'icons' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { getRate } from 'utils/getRate' const ItemDetail = ({ image, title, description, rating, price, category }) => { return ( <>

{title}

{description}

{category}

{getRate(rating?.rate)} / {rating?.count} reviews

${price}
) } export default ItemDetail
